private_publish_desc_1: Cannot change back to private once published publicly.
private_publish_desc_2: Only your team members will be able to access this space.
public_publish_desc: Anyone can access and participate in this space.
go_public_desc: Once made public, this Space will be visible to everyone and cannot be made private again.
unsaved_desc_line1: Looks like you haven't saved yet.
unsaved_desc_line2: Want to save your changes before going public,
unsaved_desc_line3: or skip it and publish anyway?
public_warning_rich: Once made public, this Space will be visible to everyone and cannot be made private again.
start_date_warning: The start date must be earlier than the end date.
no_quiz_warning: No quiz questions yet. Click the button below to add your first question.
answer_question_required: Please answer all questions before submitting.
correct_answer_required: Please define correct answers for all questions before submission.
quiz_save_required: Please save your quiz before submission becomes available.
failed_save_quiz: Failed to submit quiz. Please try again.
title: Title
quiz_submit_desc_line1: Wrong answers will reduce your reward by 50%.
quiz_submit_desc_line2: You can try again, but the reward will be halved each time.

quiz_error.min_options: Question {n} must have at least 2 options
quiz_error.no_correct: Question {n} must have at least one correct option selected

already_passed_quiz: You have already passed this quiz.
max_attempts_for_this_quiz: You have reached the maximum number of attempts (3) for this quiz.
cannot_submit_already_or_max: Cannot submit: either you have already passed or reached maximum attempts.
interactive_quiz_desc: Answer all questions and submit to test your understanding.

notif.success_body_no_penalty: Coin earned! View it in your profile.
notif.failed_body: Each wrong answer cuts your reward in half!
